meta.title: Jesús Ramírez | El Dev de Liceaga

header.name: Jesús Ramírez
header.status: LEVEL 25 | LOCATION: GTO, MX | CLASS: DEVELOPER

about.title: 01. PLAYER INFO
about.bio_p1: I am a Software Developer based in the rural hills of Romita, Guanajuato. Currently specializing in Java, I have a passion for tinkering with technology while enjoying the quiet life away from the city noise.
about.bio_p2: When I'm not debugging legacy code, you can find me working on my '90s truck, taking care of my family, or building tools to make rural life more connected. My goal is to become a Senior Full-Stack Developer combining the discipline of engineering with the creativity of a maker.

job1.title: Java Developer
job1.desc1: Mitigated high and very-high priority security vulnerabilities and code defects detected by Kiuwan static analysis.
job1.desc2: Maintained legacy Java systems, performing regression testing using JUnit and Mockito to ensure stability.
job1.desc3: Managed version control and documentation for banking-grade software (NCR Authentic 4.5).

job2.title: Junior Software Engineer
job2.desc1: Developed features based on user stories in an Agile/Kanban environment.
job2.desc2: Implemented automated QA test suites and managed Git workflows (PRs, merges).
job2.desc3: Collaborated with international teams to deliver scalable web solutions.

job3.title: Developer & Support
job3.desc1: Fixed bugs and maintained web system modules.
job3.desc2: Integrated and consumed web services for internal tools

skills.title: 03. INVENTORY
skills.subtitle: Current tech stack and tools equipped.

projects.title: 04. SIDE QUESTS
projects.subtitle: [OPTIONAL] Selected builds and tools.

items.title: Rentas Andy & Emi
items.desc: Modern product catalog and quoting app for an event rental business. Digitizes a traditional PDF catalog into an interactive web experience with direct WhatsApp checkout.

items.title: NoDrive-IAA
items.desc: Alcolock system with facial recognition for internal combustion vehicles. Awarded 2nd Place at TALEN-TIC Campus León.

items.title: Uñas Bonitas
items.desc: Promotional website for a local nail salon in Romita, Gto.

items.title: Folder Comparator
items.desc: Web-based tool that compares contents of two folders to ensure that all files are present and identical.

items.title: DiskSpeedTest
items.desc: Program that measures read and write speeds of hard disks.

items.title: Space Shooting Game
items.desc: Retro space shooting game built with Pygame.

Personal portfolio and branding project capturing the "Rural Dev" aesthetic.

meta.title: Jesús Ramírez | El Dev de Liceaga

header.name: Jesús Ramírez
header.status: NIVEL 25 | UBICACIÓN: GTO, MX | CLASE: DESARROLLADOR

about.title: 01. INFO DEL JUGADOR
about.bio_p1: Soy un Desarrollador de Software viviendo en la zona rural de Romita, Guanajuato. Actualmente especializándome en Java, me apasiona cacharrear con tecnología mientras disfruto de la vida tranquila lejos del ruido de la ciudad.
about.bio_p2: Cuando no estoy depurando código legacy, me encontrarás arreglando mi camioneta de los 90s, cuidando de mi familia o construyendo herramientas para conectar mejor la vida rural. Mi meta es convertirme en Senior Full-Stack Developer combinando la disciplina de la ingeniería con la creatividad de un maker.

job1.title: Desarrollador Java
job1.desc1: Mitigación de vulnerabilidades de seguridad y defectos de alta prioridad detectados por análisis Kiuwan.
job1.desc2: Mantenimiento de sistemas Java legacy y ejecución de pruebas de regresión con JUnit y Mockito.
job1.desc3: Gestión de control de versiones y documentación para software bancario (NCR Authentic 4.5).

job2.title: Ingeniero de Software Jr
job2.desc1: Desarrollo de funcionalidades basadas en historias de usuario en entorno Agile/Kanban.
job2.desc2: Implementación de suites de pruebas QA automatizadas y flujos Git (PRs, merges).
job2.desc3: Colaboración con equipos internacionales para entregar soluciones web escalables.

job3.title: Desarrollador y Soporte
job3.desc1: Corrección de bugs y mantenimiento de módulos del sistema web.
job3.desc2: Integración y consumo de servicios web para herramientas internas.
